metadata.title: About | Union National Tax
metadata.description: Meet the architects of modern wealth. Our mission is to bridge the gap between complex IRS regulations and the agile needs of modern businesses.

hero.fallbackSubtitle: Union National Tax bridges the gap between complex IRS regulations and the agile needs of modern consultants, creators, and agencies.

ValuesBento.title: The cultural pillars behind every engagement.
ValuesBento.integrityTitle: We protect the relationship with the IRS before anything else.
ValuesBento.integrityDescription: Integrity is the anchor. Every recommendation is vetted with documentation and long-term exposure in mind.

precision.title: Precision
precision.description: We run planning models until the numbers feel inevitable.

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.description: Every plan is built collaboratively with your leadership team.

speed.title: Speed
speed.description: We deliver decisions quickly without cutting corners on compliance.

TrustVault.title: Bank-grade security with regulatory clarity.
TrustVault.description: We operate like a compliance desk, not a boutique agency. Every plan is designed for longevity, auditability, and total confidence.

irs.title: IRS Compliant
irs.description: Strategies are mapped to verified IRS code and backed with documentation you can audit at any time.

encryption.title: 256-bit Encryption
encryption.description: Sensitive financial data is protected with the same encryption standards used by institutional banks.

strategists.title: Vetted Strategists
strategists.description: Every advisor is screened, certified, and continuously trained on the latest regulatory updates.

FounderSection.name: Jason Astwood, EA, FSCP
FounderSection.quote1: The tax code wasn't written to punish you. It was written to incentivize you.
FounderSection.bio: Jason combines two decades of experience with a strategy-first mindset to help founders keep more of what they earn. He treats every client's business with the same rigor as an institutional portfolio.
FounderSection.quote2: Planning isn't a once-a-year event. It's a partnership that compounds over time.

metadata.title: Contact | Union National Tax

metadata.title: Team | Union National Tax
metadata.description: Meet our team of CPAs, Enrolled Agents, and financial strategists dedicated to preserving wealth for the modern economy.

fallbacks.heroSubtitle: We are a team of CPAs, Enrolled Agents, and financial strategists united by a single mission: preserving wealth for the modern economy.

precision.title: Precision
precision.description: We don't deal in estimates or guesswork. Every strategy is calculated to the penny and backed by tax code.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We operate with total transparency. Our strategies are aggressive but always compliant, designed to withstand scrutiny.

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.description: We aren't just your accountants; we are your financial co-pilots, proactive year-round rather than reactive at tax time.

fallbacks.hiringDescription: We don't hire typical accountants. We hire problem solvers who love the puzzle of the tax code. If you believe in precision over speed and strategy over data entry, you belong here.
